tooltip.warpedmod.magic_mirror.tooltip: Teleports the player to their spawn point
tooltip.warpedmod.magic_mirror.tooltip2: Costs 1 level for every %1$s %2$s, max of %3$s %4$s
tooltip.warpedmod.magic_mirror.tooltip_w: Cannot be used if the player hasn't set their spawn point
tooltip.warpedmod.celestial_mirror.toolt: Teleports the player to their spawn point
Costs 1 level for every %1$s %2$s, max of %3$s %4$s
Cannot be used if the player hasn't set their spawn point
tooltip.warpedmod.abyssal_mirror.tooltip: Teleports the player to their spawn point
Cannot be used if the player hasn't set their spawn point
tooltip.warpedmod.potion_recall.tooltip_: Teleports the player to their spawn point
Cannot be used if the player hasn't set their spawn point
tooltip.warpedmod.potion_reunion.tooltip: Teleports the player to another player of their choice
Cannot teleport to players in other dimensions
Crouch + right click to select player
tooltip.warpedmod.item_totem_of_ascensio: Grants the player flight when within range of a beacon
Higher level beacons have a greater range
info.warpedmod.potion_recall.missing_or_: You tried to remember where home was, but you couldn't quite place it...
info.warpedmod.potion_recall.wrong_dimen: You tried to remember home, but it seemed too far away...
info.warpedmod.potion_reunion.forever_al: There didn't seem to be anyone around...
info.warpedmod.potion_reunion.missing_pl: You tried thinking of someone, but they seemed so far away...
info.warpedmod.potion_discord.failed_tp: You braced yourself, but nothing happened...?
info.warpedmod.mirrors.missing_or_invali: You gazed into the mirror, but there was nothing on the other side...
info.warpedmod.mirrors.wrong_dimension: You gazed into the mirror, but you couldn't see home...
info.warpedmod.mirrors.insufficient_leve: You gazed into the mirror, but the reflection seemed distant...
info.warpedmod.mirrors.use_cancelled_by_: You gazed into the mirror, but your focus was interrupted!
info.warpedmod.potion_reunion.no_player: You blindly drank the potion without thinking about another person...
advancement.warpedmod.tarnished_mirror.d: Find a Tarnished Mirror in a Trail Ruin or Desert Temple
advancement.warpedmod.celestial_mirror.d: Upgrade a Magic Mirror into a Celestial Mirror
advancement.warpedmod.abyssal_mirror.des: Upgrade your Celesital Mirror into an Abyssal Mirror
advancement.warpedmod.withered_totem.des: Acquire a Withered Totem from a Nether Fortress
advancement.warpedmod.totem_of_ascension: Restore a Withered Totem into an artifact of great power...
